description.en:
States are generic reusable capabilities that can be applied to Assets and Spaces to describe the values currently assigned to or detected from them. 

E.g., a Room instance may have a TemperatureState that has a value of 19.5 degrees Celsius, likely generated by a system using some context-relevant calculation (mean, median, max, min, etc) based on input from multiple in-room Sensors.
